name: Bundl
description: Welcome to Bundl, your ultimate crypto supply bundler designed specifically for teams and project owners. In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, maintaining control over your project's supply is crucial to ensure stability and sustained growth. Bundl offers an innovative solution to secure your supply and prevent your charts from being ruined by snipers and other market disruptions. Bundl is built with an innovative technology that ensures it is always the first buyer of the supply, providing you with unmatched security and control. Our platform is designed to empower you, giving you the tools you need to manage your project's supply effectively and reduce the sniper's pressure, often being a hassle for the project's chart. In this knowledge base, you'll find comprehensive information about how Bundl works, its key features, and how you can leverage it to safeguard your project's success. Whether you're new to crypto or an experienced project owner, Bundl is here to help you navigate the complexities of supply management with ease.
